Detailed Description

This class implements a lod texture which is a texture made up of many different textures.

Unlike a texture atlas, this texture is meant to have textures bleeding into eachother so that we can render the whole texture as one. This texture is used for the normal maps and low detail levels of the terrain texturing.

This method adds a texture tile to the lod texture.

Parameters:
pTexture the texture to add, this texture needs to be of the same format and dimensions as all the other lodItems in the lod texture
uTile 
vTile 
Returns:
pointer to the lod texture entry that points to the tile in the lod texture that is used for rendering the texture
